message.body: You act like you are sometimes though.
O.o
I act like I am saying I am?
or like I am?
Act like you are
Or, rather, perhaps, that you are a guru of relationships, that you have all the answers, that you know the _one right way_
yeah, like when I got the hell out of dodge during bible study to go fool around with some girl in a hot tub
dude
_one right way_
if anything, I'm the guy saying there isn't on right way
+e
You say one thing, you act another.
I offer perspective?
No you don't.
see, you say stuff like that, but I am somehow the asshat
You do not _offer_ anything
At least not with me
oh, well thank you
You attack with your perspective, possibly with the intent to make me think
But the offensive approach is so strong, so definitive that you absolutely cannot say that you merely _offer_ another perspective.
as apposed to my intent to...
Be an asshat.
yes, because that's my goal
I won't believe you if you say it isn't part of your goal.
Or one of your goals.
well at least you are looking at it logically
what I see is, I offer you a differing opinion on, well, just about anything
and you get all pissy about it
as if I am insulting you or something
again, because I have sooo much to gain from that
You don't offer
then what the fuck am I doing, Liz?
you seem to be the expert on what is what
Now who's taking criticism poorly.
and on black and white statements
please
this is the only way of communicating with you
I love how you intentionally try to inflame me and then get pissy when you succeed too well.
and it's not the criticism that is annoying
it's that you insist on being right
And you don't?
you consider no other option
I consider everything.
and therefore assume that I want to be right
when I am not even talking about wrong/right or black/white
again b/w statement
it's all or nothing
_I_ provide nothing
_You_ consider everything
I never said you don't provide anything.
could it be, maybe, just maybe
I said that you don't _offer_ your perspective
sorry, I offer nothing
I didn't say you offer nothing.
O.o
I said that you don't _offer_ your perspective
Liz: You don't offer
You shove it in my face, with condescending challenge
Yes, SEMANTICS
But you know me so well.
that's the only way you will take it!
and even then, you won't
Haha, you're hilarious.
I made one statement, and you decided to throw it back at me regarding who I date
Oh, so you can be provocative but I can't.
which, frankly, has nothing to do with it
I see.
sure you can
go right ahead
it's just not what we were talking about
We weren't talking about anything, really.
You were being an ass, so I responded in kind.
and I'm not going to just disagree with whatever you say
right, with maturity and all
Says the person who apparently thinks condescending sarcasm is the way to start a meaningful conversation
it was your impression that I was being an ass
If you haven't learned by now that I don't take well to condescension and consider it asshole-ish, maybe you're not as smart as I thought you were.
maybe you should just learn to deal with it
or maybe I should just take it easy on you
Maybe you should just learn how to deal with me
Psh
I don't want you to take it easy on me.
yeah, that's what I thougt
see
And that I'm so much less evolved than you
it's just ego
well
I could have told you that
I have a superiority complex.
really?
You push against it too hard, and I'm going to push back.
it's a good thing you go to the gym them
Hm.
you can push back harder
I like the change in direction and the allusion to my other interests. I just feel the implementation was a little... hm... out of place.
6 out of 10
Maybe 6.5
ok
I thought it was appropriate
1. pushing back, though clearly you were referring to it in an emotional/verbal sense
2. I feel that they are quite related. You want to be _strong_
Like I said. I like it, I just feel like it wasn't quite right.
if you indeed felt superior, nothing I say would have an affect on that
Oh, it doesn't =)
I just like arguing with you
sorry, notice the amount of time it took me to write it
Sorry, notice that I was just provoking you again.
fail
And responding to your non sequitur with one of my own
I'll take 6.5
Also, as soon as you defend, it's a win
That's how you count your provocations to me
I get the same scoring system
I was defending?
You got defensive.
Or your words could be taken that way.
no, I was explaining
Nope, still counts.
except to you, I wasn't
That's how it works with you
ok, so win for you
You can't keep double standards on the scoring, dude
Just not fair.
since it's a competition and all
so when's the race?
Oh, right, because I'm clearly serious.
you are, a little
Hmm
you do keep score, to some extent
I would say that it is a competition, a little. But I would reject that I keep score.
Or, at least, that I do it consciously.
so less a match, more a blow by blow
More a friendly game
Where the rules are made up and the points don't matter
they never do
and we come full circle
A game where we try to see how far we can go before we say something unforgivable.
I feel in a way that we suffer from the complete opposite problems when it comes to dating
Possibly; elaborate.
well, you seem to get...
hmm, let's see if I can do this without being insulting
Emotionally involved
And you don't
http://www.quickmeme.com/meme/367kvk/
sort of
I was going more for quickly infatuated
I can't see quickmeme at work =(
wait, hold on
nevermind
Yeah, I can't see the full text
http://imgur.com/NNTMo
What I see
I think
I can't actually open imgur in firefox right now
I don't get deeply infatuated
http://t.qkme.me/367kvk.jpg
that might work
There's like this superficial infatuation
whatever
Oh, I thought you wanted to discuss things
Nevermind
anyway, I used to get the same way
You don't even know how I get
just waiting for you to stop defending yourself
I was just trying to explain
Whatever
oh, right
Andres +1
I was trying to share insight into my personality
Not defend
But nevermind
I guess you really do assume that what you see is what _is_
So nevermind.
no, I realize that what I see is not the full story, but I'm ok with that
sometimes I enjoy the birds eye view
but the feeling that you get, whatever it is
it makes you confident
and that is confident in the sense that you know how you feel
you think, "I like this boy..."
and that is really all that matters

Yeah, well, then I respectfully request that you refrain in the future from using your admittedly limited perspective from the "bird's eye view" to generalize about how I think and feel, under the guise of knowing me better than I know myself. Since you apparently aren't interested in knowing me past the surface level of my actions/words.
if you don't have that_feeling_, then it's more like, "I kinda like this boy, but I'm not sure..."
God, you're turning me back into teenage me.
I respectfully request that you don't ask me to do things that go against my nature, because 1. It's not going to happen, and 2. I do whatever the fuck I want
It's called intution
The world will never forgive you.
or gut-feeling, or whatever
Hopefully it doesn't spill over into my other relationships.
I don't need to _know_ all the details
/smh
and I don't need to be right
We are never going to understand each other.
but that doesn't mean I don't have something to offer
"Speaking from an uninformed and willfully ignorant position doesn't matter -- I can still offer insight."
Sure. It's just fucking useless at that point.
only because you say it is
Mrs. Ego
oh, sorry
Ms. please
Ms. Ego
You are like a religious zealot
And your religion is your ego
not true
my religion is my not-ego
but you are thinking of ego in a different sense than I am talking about
You reject the opportunity to learn about other people because you're so centered in your own world.
umm
They don't actually matter past a point in your worldview
that's possibly the opposite?
It's what you want, what you think
What you _intuit_ that matters
And that's apparently all that matters
in a way
That, and that they consider your bullshit intuition
but you have to remove the you and your from that
Whatever man
what I want/think doesnt matter
I'm really starting to think that you either 1) Have no idea what the fuck you think 2) Are absolute shite at expressing it
any more than what you do
Oh, so now we're switching to a universal discussion
more the latter
And not interpersonal politics
I think that could fall under "moving the goal posts"
it's somewhat related
It isn't.
but, yes, we digress
Not as you stated it.
_You_ digress.
there's that word again
I was on topic
of course, what what it? Ms. Ego?
ah
_You_ are the one who pulled out "But, in the end, does anything _really_ matter"
so anyway
You need to learn how to communicate if you actually want to have a meaningful impact.
you get all gushy over these boys
But, wait, I forget, you don't want to have anything.
uh huh
Because nothing ultimately matters.
sure
You just like talking at people
_with_ people
at
at is boring
And then getting mildly offended when they don't follow your befuddled and befuddling "advice"
no, not offended
I do get gushy over them.
remember: impossible
Superficially.
or at least very unlikely
but, _you_ digress
We probably just have differing definitions of offense
my problem is, I don't seem to be able to be infatuated anymore
There is no discussion here of worth to digress from if you want to discuss "how I get"
and it's not entirely surprising
I 'like' people, but I don't feel the connection that I crave
I only go out with people who I feel that connection with
Seems like you have it with Amy
ha
there is something there
which confuses/annoys the fuck out of me
but it's not much
Maybe you don't let it
I 'like' Ally
I 'like' Amy
I 'like' Claire
You don't like Ally, you find her marginally diverting.
You like Claire because she's reasonably attractive and interesting.
my level of like for her is fairly low
You have feelings for Amy.
but that doesn't mean it's not there
eh, feelings
Even if it's just curiosity, you have feelings for her.
More so than with Claire
Much more so than with Ally
Christine's too new
I have more concern for Amy, I suppose
but that's more because I think she needs it more
and go ahead and pick that apart now...
/shrug
I tend to have an attraction to people in 'distress'
You are probably either building Amy up in your heading, or suppressing feelings for her.
I remember, many years ago..
Rather, I think* you are.
talking to my co-worker
Some part of you is interfering in some way with how you feel about her.
She remains the biggest question mark.
she told me about how she was seeing a therapist, had been for some time
You categorize the other ones quickly.
I was immediately attracted to her
with Amy, it's more about the circimstances
It's weird how we're so alike sometimes, but so very very fucking different
and her actions/words
And you find her fairly attractive
eh
she's ok
You were singing her praises after Josh's party
Oh the physical front
she looked particularly good that night
Okay
but normally, she's just alright
She looked the same to me as every other time I've seen her
yeah, you're a girl
Women probably check out women as much as men do
she's pretty, but that has very little to do with anything
to _me_ she looked better, but how many times did you see me talking to her?
Who would want to talk to her that night?
She had her bitch face on full force
I think that is just how she usually looks
No comment.
she has a nice smile?
Does she?
I'm not sure I've seen her smile.
when she does smile, that is
I have
a lot
When she was praising your sexual prowess?
lol
hmm
sex
so last night...
nope
O.o
she said to me that she doesn't know how far things should go
I think my response was, "as far as you want them to go?"
Claire?
she's clearly thinking about it too much, which I sort of communicated to her when I told her that I typically don't think about it that much
which makes me sound like a whore, but whatevs
um, yeah
It doesn't make you sound like a whore
ok, like a guy then
She def has more feelings for you than you seem to for her
you think?
Nah, it just sounds like you don't think about it too much?
I'd guess so.
What she was saying is kind of how I was with Michael.
<sarcasm>
Ah
Silly me, thinking you were sincere.
indeed
to me, it's just sex
and I know, guy
but that's not the case
Really?
I have to be comfortable with someone before I can sleep with them
I'm confused now
we've know each other and spent enough time together for me to develop that
Please reconcile "it's just sex" and "I have to be comfortable"
Because there seems to be a gap there
but she has this thing in her head that we just started dating, therefore should be holding off
Well, maybe not
Nevermind, I've reconciled
nah, it is just sex
Moving along
ok, good
So disabuse her of the notion that you're dating
If you're just looking to sleep with her
she wanted to, clearly
and then her bed broke
oops
stupid swedes and their cheap furniture
My bed is of IKEA make lol
Or, rather, my mattress & box-thing are
I guess I don't technically have a "bed"
None of those fancy headboards/footboards
bedframe
and it's called a boxspring
my bed frame is Ikea as well
but I don't have those stupid slats holding it up
Ahh
My box-thing is slatted
I have a boxspring
Not springed
well then it's not a boxspring
What were YOU guys doing? ^_^
That's why I called it a box-thing lol
it wasn't all that
her bed is probably just not used to there being two people in it
that, and it's dumb
we fixed it, and went to sleep
then it happened again this morning when I was leaving
lol
not the near-sex, the bed slats falling off
ah
Mine do not fall off
I noticed
They are encapsulated in a frame of sorts
Not that I've looked lately
oh, well se
But I'm pretty sure they're affixed
Not floating
Jake's bed had moveable slats
Which was effing annoying at times
here are held together with string
or something
I told her I can probably reinforce it somehow
so that it doesn't keep happening. It's quite loud
ha
Unfortunate
well, it was kind of good timing
XD
and I have to admit
I'm not sure what to make of it at this point
and it's not so much the lack of sex, it's more the reasoning for it that bothers me
but, I know that she isn't really looking for anything serious. I mean, she is leaving in about a year
Yeah, but there are different levels of serious
Can still be serious and not be looking to get married and settle down
yeah, that concerns me a little
I don't envision seeing her on more than a casual level at this point
Alright, I need to close this and do work
possibly be on later. If not, talk to you Sunday or Monday most likely.
srsly
